LightningComponentBundle.description: LWC to upload a PDF, capture a signature, and apply it to the PDF.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id (Optional)
property.description: If provided, the signed PDF will be related to this record.

property.name: primaryColor
property.label: Primary Color
property.description: Primary color for theme elements (e.g., completed steps). Defaults to Nuvitek theme.

property.name: accentColor
property.label: Accent Color
property.description: Accent color for highlights (e.g., current step). Defaults to Nuvitek theme.

property.name: primaryColorRgb
property.label: Primary Color RGB
property.description: RGB equivalent of Primary Color (e.g., '34, 189, 193') for use in rgba() shadows.

property.name: accentColorRgb
property.label: Accent Color RGB
property.description: RGB equivalent of Accent Color (e.g., '213, 223, 35') for use in rgba() shadows.
